attributes.action: extend the range of countries with which the United Kingdom has a reciprocal healthcare agreement for the purposes of bona fide holiday or business travel, having particular emphasis on countries that are members of the Commonwealth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is incongruous that reciprocal healthcare agreements should exist with countries that were part of the former Soviet bloc, but that no such agreement has yet been agreed with Canada or the USA.
